attributes.action: Consider the rebuilding and/or expansion of Birmingham Snow Hill Railway Station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I use Snow Hill station on a regular basis, and I find it to be a cramped, dark and generally unpleasant station to use.  It is also hopelessly inadequate in its size, Considering the amount of traffic that uses it.  I am asking that a thorough upgrade/and or expansion plan be considered.
